title: Campaigner

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-While campaigning during the night, if your target takes an action that would result in them attacking a Loyalist, including the Governor, you will attempt to roleblock them.
-When you campaign during the day, the target will secretly gain one additional voting power for that day. They will know that they have this new voting power.

desc:

-Campaign for a player during the day (2-shot)
